decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PL/VP/2431-01, PL/VP/2431-02, PL/VP/2431-03-B, PL/VP/2431-04-B, PL/VP/2431-05, PL/VP/2431-06-B, PL/VP/2431-07-B, PL/VP/2431-08 received 25/11/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions and outbuilding hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The windows formed in the northern elevation shall be obscure glazed, high-level opening only and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 358 Jersey Road, TW7 5PL.
description: Erection of a single storey and part two storey rear extension, two storey side extension, two rear roof extensions, side infill front porch extension and detached outbuilding in the rear garden of the property following demolition of existing side extension
